messages.pass: the autocomplete attribute is correctly formatted
messages.fail: Add autocomplete attribute to form fields with a valid value as per HTML specification : https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#autofill-detail-tokens. In "name" attribute of field, prefer to use standard autocomplete value since browsers use "name" to suggest autofill. For field with no standard autocomplete value (eg: College ID), prefer to use autocomplete="off".
